Subskills.name: High Protein
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by meat bomb.

Subskills.name: Far Reaching Meat
Subskills.description: Increases the cast range of meat bomb.

Subskills.name: Strong Bones
Subskills.description: Pull nearby monsters into the explosion location.

Subskills.name: Metabolic Lump
Subskills.description: Recover a portion of your maximum life on hit.

Subskills.name: Cadavery
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of corpses created by meat bomb.

Subskills.name: Elastic Meat
Subskills.description: Meatbomb bounces off the ground dealing area of effect damage with each bounce.

Subskills.name: High Blood Pressure
Subskills.description: Increases meat bombs explosion area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Colossal Carcass
Subskills.description: Throw a massive chunk of meat with increased size and damage sending monsters airborne dealing area of effect damage when landing.

Subskills.name: Double The Meat
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional meat bomb.

Subskills.name: Fleshy Leftovers
Subskills.description: Chance for smaller chunks of meat to explode and spawn an additional corpse.

Subskills.name: Rotten Corpses
Subskills.description: Converts meat bombs damage to poison inflicting poisoned. Consumed corpses unleash a poison nova.

Subskills.name: Multi Lumps
Subskills.description: Throw multiple meat bombs in an arc inflicting arcane break on hit.
